meanings.definition: A plant of the rose family with spiny stems and yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The agrimonies in the garden bloomed beautifully in the spring.
meanings.sent2: I picked some agrimonies to add color to the bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The agrimonies seemed to be guarding the other flowers with their sharp thorns.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like agrimonies, beautiful yet guarded.
meanings.sent5: The agrimonies stood out among the other plants with their unique appearance.

meanings.sent1: The agrimonies between them made the atmosphere tense.
meanings.sent2: His face showed the agrimonies he felt towards his rival.
meanings.sent3: Despite their agrimonies, they managed to work together on the project.
meanings.sent4: The agrimonies in her voice were evident as she spoke about the situation.
meanings.sent5: The agrimonies in the room were palpable, creating an uncomfortable silence.
